title: ConcentrationLimitTypeEnum
description: Represents the enumerated values to identify where a concentration limit is applied.

oneOf.title: Asset
oneOf.description: Specifies a limit on a single asset in the portfolio

oneOf.title: BaseCurrencyEquivalent
oneOf.description: Specifies a limit on all cash valued in the base currency of the portfolio.

oneOf.title: IndustrySector
oneOf.description: Specifies a limit on a single industry sector in the portfolio.

oneOf.title: IssueOutstandingAmount
oneOf.description: Specifies a limit of the issue compared to the outstanding amount of the asset on the market.

oneOf.title: Issuer
oneOf.description: Specifies a limit on a single issuer in the portfolio.

oneOf.title: MarketCapitalisation
oneOf.description: Specifies a limit of the issue calculated as a percentage of the market capitalisation of the asset on the market.

oneOf.title: PrimaryExchange
oneOf.description: Specifies a limit on a single exchange in the portfolio.

oneOf.title: UltimateParentInstitution
oneOf.description: Specifies a limit on a single issuer in the portfolio at the ultimate parent institution level.
